about_the_game:
Rank Warmaster: Bunker Buster meets tactical control with strategic execution, bringing RTS elements to this sci-fi, action tower defense.

Acquire resources as you further secure your bunker strategically placing perimeters and defensive and offensive units.

Research and develop ground defenses and classes of airborne units. Upgrade various types of weapons, armor and equipment to thwart oppressive attacks from different types of enemies.

DEFEND TO SURVIVE

After establishing a resource mining base, an unknown force attacks your base for your resources. It quickly seems they have a deeper agenda.

More attacks commence with the support of rival factions, eventually providing clues to what prompted the attacks.

What initially appeared to be an attempt to pirate resources, a sinister plan slowly is revealed, one that threatens the very existence of your colony.

ADVANCED UNIT DEVELOPMENT

Develop different unit class types with varying attributes to address specific threats.

Balance weapons, buffs, and other upgrades for each unit type for a cohesive battle strategy that caters to a variety of play styles.

MULTIPLE VANTAGE POINTS

Observe the action and give orders from a strategic viewpoint or while directly operating a ship.

Regardless of the chosen role, easily toggle between vantage points for an immersive experience.

ADDRESS REAL-TIME THREATS

Develop reinforcements or build and repair defenses during the heat of battle.

Do what’s necessary to survive or take a risk by limiting resource usage for greater rewards.

PROGRESSIVE CAMPAIGNS

Carry out 30 missions, each one advancing the narrative while providing rewards based on overall performance and efficient use of resources.

Replay campaigns to master techniques and achieve the highest reward tier to gain additional research assets to further enhance units.
detailed_description:
Rank Warmaster: Bunker Buster meets tactical control with strategic execution, bringing RTS elements to this sci-fi, action tower defense.

Acquire resources as you further secure your bunker strategically placing perimeters and defensive and offensive units.

Research and develop ground defenses and classes of airborne units. Upgrade various types of weapons, armor and equipment to thwart oppressive attacks from different types of enemies.

DEFEND TO SURVIVE

After establishing a resource mining base, an unknown force attacks your base for your resources. It quickly seems they have a deeper agenda.

More attacks commence with the support of rival factions, eventually providing clues to what prompted the attacks.

What initially appeared to be an attempt to pirate resources, a sinister plan slowly is revealed, one that threatens the very existence of your colony.

ADVANCED UNIT DEVELOPMENT

Develop different unit class types with varying attributes to address specific threats.

Balance weapons, buffs, and other upgrades for each unit type for a cohesive battle strategy that caters to a variety of play styles.

MULTIPLE VANTAGE POINTS

Regardless of the chosen role, easily toggle between vantage points for an immersive experience.

Carry out 30 missions, each one advancing the narrative while providing rewards based on overall performance and efficient use of resources.

Replay campaigns to master techniques and achieve the highest reward tier to gain additional research assets to further enhance units.
developers: Laser Beams & Particle Streams Software, Inc.
name: Rank: Warmaster Bunker Buster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5 intel or above
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 or above (Must support OpenGL 4.x and have 3+ GB of GPU RAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You need a direct X compatible sound card (it will crash without one)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Laser Beams & Particle Streams Software, Inc.
short_description: Tactical control meets strategic execution in this real-time, action tower defense. Develop classes of customized units and leverage different vantage points to defend your stake and ensure your colony’s survival.
